attributes.review: I tried to download the app because I was inspired until I realized I don’t support trump...😦 and when I said it out loud I think the app heard me and then it started yelling all these mean things 😖it said “TRUMP 2020”😈 I got so scared that I dropped my phone and it started walking up the wall 😳I grabbed my phone and said “what do you want”😥 it said VOTE TRUMP👹 I said no not the orange man 😿they said yes the orange 🍊 smelly stank breath small baby hand man 🥴 I tried to delete the app and it worked and I’ve never even said the word trump after that 😪 till this day I wonder what would’ve happened if I actually supported him😷 don’t be afraid to tell your story we have to stick together 🤕thank you for listening 👂 delete the app never vote TRUMP 🤢

attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review:
I wish I couldn’t have downloaded this app. It took forever to load, and when it finally did, asked for my phone number. I was like “okay I’ll give it my phone number”, and as soon as I did, TONS of messages flooded my phones. I kept texting STOP STOP STOP because the phone vibrations were a disturbance at work, but it just kept going. I went BACK into the app to see if I could turn it off, and it WOULDN'T LET ME CHANGE IT. Plus, every-time I opened the app, it crashed. 
Aside from that, the news given in this app was unreliable and not up to date. I was hoping to know some upcoming events and it shows events from 2019 asking if I want to join them?!!! TERRIBLE APP!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: I wish I didn’t download this

attributes.review: Do not under ANY circumstances download this app. I installed it with low expectations and was honestly surprised by how much worst it could get. For starters, when i first opened the app my phone IMMEDIATELY crashed and it took AN HOUR to reboot and as soon as it did the look was permanently changed. There is a blinding orange tint on my screen that i cant seem to get rid of and my wallpapers have been replace with a picture of the most hideous, crusty, racist, homophobic, misogynistic trash-bag i’ve ever had the pain of witnessing. Not to mention, every time i try to play one of my songs all i heat is “Grab ‘em by the p*ssy playing over and over again on repeat until the song ends. I will have permanent trauma all because of this app. DO NOT INSTALL

attributes.title: bill nye the Russian spy

attributes.review:
I am appalled by the people who developed this app. The first couple of weeks that I had downloaded it, things were going fine and the notifications were as normal as can be. But after a while, I started to get very interesting messages...messages such as: 
“I like what you’re wearing, bb gurl” and “dam shawty you thiccer than a bowl of oatmeal”.  At first I thought it was a glitch but as the days went by the messages got worse and more persistent. I finally deleted the app when i started to get sent nudes; nakey pictures from the president himself. I am ✨appalled✨ my eyes are now forever scarred by the image of his wrinkly, hairy, orange-ness......among other smaller than average things. in conclusion: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
